HOME.TITLE: Hello, Fi Seed!
HOME.SUBTITLE: Welcome to the base template. It's based on Bootstrap so you might find you way around quickly.

1.TITLE: Secure and clean
1.BODY: is not a framework, it's just a boilerplate or proposed structure. With transparency, cleaness and security in mind, it's built for the developer, allowing you to create applications quickly and customize them as much as you want, always with the end user in mind so they can have an awesome experience with your application.

2.TITLE: No weird stuff
2.BODY: We've focused on building it using the most widely adopted standards and not forcing an Express.js application to behave like MVC or any another thing but itself while giving you, the developer, the freedom to do anything you want with it.

3.TITLE: Theme and styles
3.BODY: Want to review your visual styles as you edit them? Follow the link below to open the theme page and take a look at all the Bootstrap elements.

THEME.TITLE: Theme example
THEME.SUBTITLE: This is a template showcasing the theme stylesheet included in Bootstrap. Use it as a starting point to create something more unique by building on or modifying it and reviewing the changes here.

FLASHES.TITLE: Flashes
FLASHES.SUBTITLE: Click any of the buttons to show a related flash message.

INFO.TITLE: Look here!
INFO.MESSAGE: This is a very informative message.

LOST.TITLE: Can't find that
LOST.SUBTITLE: A.K.A. 404
LOST.BODY: The resource couldn't be located. Maybe we left it somewhere and we don't remember where.

ERROR.TITLE: Something bad happened
ERROR.SUBTITLE: A.K.A. 500
ERROR.BODY: Something caused a server hiccup or maybe it choked on something.

FORBIDDEN.TITLE: You can't see that
FORBIDDEN.SUBTITLE: A.K.A. 403
FORBIDDEN.BODY: You tried to access content that's not available to you.
